# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you believe youâ€™ve found a security issue in the Validibot CLI, please report it
privately so we can investigate and fix it.

- Email: `support@validibot.com`
- Please include: CLI version, OS, reproduction steps, and any relevant logs (redact API
  keys/tokens).

Please do not open a public issue for suspected security vulnerabilities.

## Supported Versions

Security fixes are provided for the latest released version of `validibot-cli`.
